title: DeviceDefinition data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' This is a DeviceDefinition resource

id.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Identifier' An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

udiDeviceIdentifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/DeviceDefinition_UdiDeviceIdentifier' The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

manufacturerString.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' A name of the manufacturer.

_manufacturerString.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

manufacturerReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

deviceName.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/DeviceDefinition_DeviceName' The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

modelNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_modelNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be DeviceDefinition

specialization.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/DeviceDefinition_Specialization' The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

version.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_version.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

safety.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

shelfLifeStorage.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ProductShelfLife' The shelf-life and storage information for a medicinal product item or container can be described using this class.

physicalCharacteristics.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ProdCharacteristic' The marketing status describes the date when a medicinal product is actually put on the market or the date as of which it is no longer available.

languageCode.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

capability.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/DeviceDefinition_Capability' The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

property.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/DeviceDefinition_Property' The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

owner.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

contact.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ContactPoint' Details for all kinds of technology mediated contact points for a person or organization, including telephone, email, etc.

url.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_url.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

onlineInformation.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_onlineInformation.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Annotation' A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

quantity.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Quantity' A measured amount (or an amount that can potentially be measured). Note that measured amounts include amounts that are not precisely quantified, including amounts involving arbitrary units and floating currencies.

parentDevice.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

material.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/DeviceDefinition_Material' The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.
